page.title: 15CULLODEN POTTERY GOLLANFIELD
page.content: { Culloden Pottery}used to be called the{Old Smithy}for there used to be a blacksmiths there.Before that it was a road side inn for the highway coaches and there used to be a place for the horses to rest. It was built here beside the{Old Military Road}which was the{main road south. The whole of{Culloden Pottery}is set into four parts;the {Cottage },the clothes shop called {Touch of Class,} the actual {Pottery}and the{ {restaurant.}Bob Parks owns the Pottery and he has lived there for 18 years;since then he has doubled the size of the{Pottery. }The{Pottery}is a great attraction to {tourists.} His mugs are a speciality.
